revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WG602 |revision=v1 |asin= |fcc_date=02/25/2003 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Z-Com |manuf_model=XG-1000 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=PY3WG602 |ic_id=4054A-WG602 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=IDT |cpu1_model=79RC32V334;79RC32V334-150BB; |cpu1_cspeed=150 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F320J3A-110 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ASCEND |ram1_model=AD484M1644VTA-7 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-600 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3680 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8139C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.2.14;Jungo; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.0.227 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:09:5B |oui_eth=00:09:5B }} {{TagLine|54Mbps Wireless Access Point}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WG602v1|vs_id=2572}}
"802.11G AP V02" and "2003.01.06" appears to be silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. The default SSID is, according to the manual, '''NETGEAR'''.
*[http://www.seattlewireless.net/index.cgi/NetgearWG602 On the '''Seattle Wireless''' wiki] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20060622204403/http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/Reviews/images/scrnshots/netgear_wg602_intpix.jpg Board image on '''SmallNetBuilder''' review] (via archive.org)
